steps.name: Validate Input
steps.description: Validates input files are .fastq format; truncates to 75 million fragments

steps.name: STAR
steps.description: Implements step for Host Subtraction

steps.name: Trimmomatic
steps.description: Removes adapter sequences

steps.name: Price Seq
steps.description: Removes low-quality reads

steps.name: CZID-dedup
steps.description: Identifies and collapses duplicate reads

steps.name: LZW
steps.description: Removes low-complexity reads

steps.name: Bowtie2
steps.description: Removes remaining host reads

steps.name: Subsample
steps.description: Randomly subsamples 1 million fragments

steps.name: STAR
steps.description: Remove human reads using STAR

steps.name: Bowtie2
steps.description: Remove residual human reads using Bowtie2

steps.name: GSNAP
steps.description: Removes all potentially-human sequences

steps.name: Alignment Minimap2
steps.description: Align remaining reads to the NCBI NT database using minimap2

steps.name: Call Hits Minimap2
steps.description: Assign accessions from minimap2 to taxon

steps.name: Alignment Diamond
steps.description: Align remaining reads to the NCBI NR database using diamond

steps.name: Call Hits Diamond
steps.description: Assign accessions from diamond to taxon

steps.name: Combine Taxon Counts
steps.description: Count preliminary taxon hits.

steps.name: Generate Annotated Fasta
steps.description: Annotate non-host FASTA with preliminary NCBI accession IDs.

steps.name: Assembly
steps.description: Assemble non-host reads using SPAdes.

steps.name: Generate Coverage Stats
steps.description: Calculate coverage statistics for assembled contigs

steps.name: Download Accessions Gsnap Accessions
steps.description: Generate FASTA of candidate references matched during GSNAP / NT alignment.

steps.name: Download Accessions Rapsearch2 Accessions
steps.description: Generate FASTA of candidate references matched during RAPSearch2 / NR alignment.

steps.name: Blast Contigs Refined Gsnap
steps.description: BLAST assembled contigs against candidate references from NT; reassign corresponding reads to the matched taxon.

steps.name: Blast Contigs Refined Rapsearch2
steps.description: BLAST assembled contigs against candidate references from NR; reassign corresponding reads to the matched taxon.

steps.name: Combine Taxon Counts
steps.description: Count taxon hits after the reassignment based on the BLAST results.

steps.name: Combine Json
steps.description: Record statistics on the assembled contigs.

steps.name: Generate Annotated Fasta
steps.description: Annotate non-host FASTA with NCBI accession IDs after the BLAST-based match refinement.

steps.name: Generate Taxid Locator
steps.description: Annotate non-host FASTA with revised Taxonomy IDs after the BLAST-based match refinement.

steps.name: Nonhost Fastq
steps.description: Filter original fastq/fasta input files to only contain non-host reads processed by CZ ID.
